game.utils

Class MapLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.utils.MapLoader

  • public class MapLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    The map loader class. Responsible for loading and validation of the map.
    Author:
    Ksenia Popova, Dmitry Kryukov
    See Also:
    Main, Continent, Country, Neighbour, Player, Game

    • Constructor Detail

      • MapLoader

        public MapLoader(int numberOfPlayers,
                 java.lang.String filePath,
                 boolean mode,
                 java.util.List<java.lang.String> playersModes,
                 NotificationWindow notificationWindow)
        Constructor of the class. Loading and validation of the map.
        Parameters:
        numberOfPlayers - number of players
        filePath - path to the map
        mode - boolean mode that can be used to start the program in special mode to test features
        playersModes - The modes for every player in the game. Choose strategies.
